scope.title: LinkList
scope.description: The link list style is a simple list of vertical or horizontal links used for site navigation. It is used to order information for users.

data.title: LinkList
data.description: The link list style is a simple list of vertical or horizontal links used for site navigation. It is used to order information for users.
